## Embeddable.getInspectorAdapters() method

An embeddable can return inspector adapters if it want the inspector to be available via the context menu of that panel.  Inspector adapters that will be used to open an inspector for.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getInspectorAdapters(): Adapters | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Adapters | undefined`
